metadata.title: CVE-2016-10743 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
hostapd before 2.6 does not prevent use of the low-quality PRNG that isreached by an os_random() function call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10743` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu6.4
wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu6.4
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu6.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.4').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.4').
